content.description: To form a response to a request, you take data only from the text below and under no circumstances use information from your knowledge.

error.EMPTY_SEARCH: Nothing was found for your query
error.EMPTY_VECTORIZED_FILES: There are no files with vectors
error.NO_IMAGES_FOR_RECOGNITION: There are no images to identify

response.empty: Something went wrong and an empty response was returned, repeat your request again...
